alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; New River Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 6:53PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong line of showers with embedded thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa County through 745 PM MST... At 652 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Deer Valley Airport to near South Phoenix. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Scottsdale, Gilbert, Tempe, Fountain Hills, Paradise Valley, East Mesa, Cave Creek, Carefree, Tempe Marketplace, Papago Park, Piestewa Peak Park, Deer Valley Airport, Granite Reef Dam, Falcon Field Airport, Salt River Indian Community, North Mountain Park, Freestone Park and Downtown Scottsdale. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 145 and 157. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 196, and between mile markers 209 and 222. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
